He was described by witnesses from the area as a White male about 60 years old, about 5' 4" (64â€) tall, weighed about 165 pounds.  He had white hair and greenish-blue eyes. Identity may be confirmed with a right thumbprint (SB CAL-ID), dental X-rays (on file with DOJ-MUPS), or DNA (CA DOJ-DNA/CODIS #BK-07-000939)
